<!--
This page mimics the style of https://www.uab.edu/medicine/alzheimers/research
-->

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, messages = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{css}
p {
  color: #545454;
}

h1 {
  font-family: "Scope One";
  color: #007348;
  font-weight: 300;
  font-size: 56px;
}

h3 {
  margin-top: 0.75em;
  color: #007348;
  font-weight: 500;
  padding-left: 10px;
}

footer {
  color: #7d7d7d;
  font-weight: 300;
  font-size: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 3em;
}

/* wrapper container */
.container-fluid {
  max-width: 1100px;
  margin: auto;
  margin-top: 2em;
}

/* title generated by Rmarkdown */
.title {
  display: none;
}

/* hospital title */
#page-title {
  margin-bottom: 2em;
}
#page-title p {
  color: #242424;
}
#page-title .title-name {
  font-size: 26px;
  font-weight: 500;
  margin-bottom: 0;
}
#page-title .title-sub {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

#sidebar {
  background: #fff;
  border: none;
  box-shadow: none;
  padding-left: 0;
}
#sidebar > a {
  display: block;
  border-bottom: 1px #c9c9c9 solid;
  height: 3em;
  line-height: 3em;
  color: #242424;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 16px;
  padding-left: 10px;
}
#sidebar > a:hover {
  background: #007348;
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
}
#sidebar > a:first-of-type {
  border-top: 1px #c9c9c9 solid;
}
#sidebar .fab {
  margin-left: 5px;
}

#mainPanel p {
  font-size: 16px;
  line-height: 200%;
  margin-bottom: 1.5em;
}

.green-button {
  margin: 3rem auto 3rem auto;
  width: 50%;
}
.green-button > a {
  padding: 1rem;
  border: 2px #007348 solid;
  color: #007348;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 500;
  text-decoration: none;
}
.green-button > a:hover {
  background: #007348;
  color: #fff;
  transition-duration: 400ms;
}
```

<!-- EDIT SIDEBAR LINKS HERE -->

```{r}
# links on sidebar
sidebar_links <- list(
  list(name = 'Data Explorer', url = 'link/to/1'),
  list(name = 'Operations Dashboard', url = 'link/to/2'),
  list(name = htmltools::tagList("Source Code", shiny::icon("github")), url = 'https://www.github.com/cfmurch')
)

# convert to html
sidebar_links_html <- lapply(sidebar_links, function(x) {
  htmltools::a(
    href = x[['url']],
    x[['name']]
  )
})

# add header
sidebar_content <- htmltools::tagList(
  htmltools::h3('Resources'),
  sidebar_links_html
)
```

```{r}
# example button
example_button <- htmltools::div(
  class = 'green-button',
  htmltools::a(
    href = 'link/to/page',
    'My button'
  )
)
```

```{r}
# define the page
shiny::fluidPage(
  
  htmltools::div(
    id = 'page-title',
    htmltools::a(
      href = 'https://www.uab.edu/medicine/alzheimers/',
      htmltools::p(
        class = 'title-name',
        "Alzheimer's Disease Center"
      ),
      htmltools::p(
        class = 'title-sub',
        "Heersink School of Medicine"
      )
    )
  ),
  
  shiny::sidebarLayout(
    shiny::sidebarPanel(
      width = 4,
      id = 'sidebar',
      sidebar_content
    ),
    
    shiny::mainPanel(
      width = 8,
      id = 'mainPanel',
      main_panel_content
    )
  ),
  
  htmltools::hr(),
  htmltools::tags$footer(
    htmltools::HTML(
      glue::glue(
        "&copy {format(Sys.Date(), '%Y')} The University of Alabama at Birmingham"
      )
    )
  )
)
```
